parameters.message: "Creating body at loop " & loopindex("fillIndex") & ", NodeIndex will be: " & loopindex("fillIndex")

"Created HEAD OwnerID=" & snake_head.OwnerID &
            " Grid=(" & snake_head.GridX & "," & snake_head.GridY & ")"

children.text: Case 1  Body  di head  head quay ln
Case 2  Body  tri head  head quay phi
Case 3  Body  trn head  head quay xung
Case 4  Body  phi head  head quay tri
Case 5  Body  tri-di  Head quay phi-ln ()
Case 6  Body  phi-di  Head quay tri-ln ()
Case 7  Body  tri-trn  Head quay phi-xung ()
Case 8  Body  phi-trn  Head quay tri-xung ()

parameters.message: "Body " & snake_body.NodeIndex & " updated position to (" & checkpoint.GridX & "," & checkpoint.GridY & ") and SAVED to Dictionary"
"Body " & snake_body.NodeIndex & " will continue to (" & nextTargetX & "," & nextTargetY & ")"

children.text: TH2: Head blocked by other head or body

parameters.message: "Body " & snake_body.NodeIndex & " pulling back to (" &  snake_body.PrevX & "," & snake_body.PrevY & ")"

children.text: TH3: Head is not blocked and will move to the edge of grid or blocked by other head or body
Case 1  Body  di head  head quay ln
Case 2  Body  tri head  head quay phi
Case 3  Body  trn head  head quay xung
Case 4  Body  phi head  head quay tri
Case 5  Body  tri-di  Head quay phi-ln ()
Case 6  Body  phi-di  Head quay tri-ln ()
Case 7  Body  tri-trn  Head quay phi-xung ()
Case 8  Body  phi-trn  Head quay tri-xung ()

parameters.message: "Body " & snake_body.NodeIndex & " GridPos set to: " & snake_body.GridX & "," & snake_body.GridY
"Body " & snake_body.NodeIndex & " moving to checkpoint at (" & checkpoint.GridX & "," & checkpoint.GridY & ")"
"Checking checkpoint at (" & checkpoint.GridX & "," & checkpoint.GridY & ") vs target (" & snake_head.NextGridX & "," & snake_head.NextGridY & ")"

"IDX=" & snake_body.NodeIndex 
& " PrevBody=(" & PrevBodyGX & "," & PrevBodyGY & ")"
& " Now=(" & snake_body.GridX & "," & snake_body.GridY & ")"
& " HasTurn=" & snake_body.HasTurn
